name: Motorbike Freestyle
description:
Motorbike Freestyle is a physics engine motorbike game.

If you like simulator games, drifting, crushing, trials try it.
Smooth controls, realistic motorbike physics. Test your real freestyle skills.

***FEATURES***
* Day and Night levels
* 5 different bikes and players
* Huge ramps and hills
* Easy controllers
* Realistic driving experience and feelings
* Beautiful Graphics
* Realistic sound environment
* Realistic physics
* Tablet support and FULL HD support
